original_title: Arts And Crafts History: Facts About Crochet
overview: Crochet is a process of creating textiles by using a crochet hook to interlock loops of yarn, thread, or strands of other materials. This documentary explores the incredible hobby and its history, welcome to the world of Crochet.
tagline: explore the history of your favorite crafts!
title: Arts And Crafts History: Facts About Crochet
